data.title: St. Mary Catholic Church
data.meta_description: At St. Mary Catholic Church, we seek to provide spiritual guidance and support to our community. Our message of hope, healing, love and compassion is spread through our services and our community involvement. We welcome everybody to join us for masses, community gatherings, and community volunteerism.
data.text:
We invite everyone to come out and enjoy the picnic on Sunday Sept 1.

Below is a schedule of the day’s events. There is something for everyone to enjoy at the picnic!

PICNIC SCHEDULE – SUNDAY, SEPTEMBER 1, 2024

9:30 AM Flag Raising Ceremony in front of the church

10:15 AM Polka Mass - St. Mary Church

10:30 AM Drive thru food line will be formed on the south side on FM 2672

Hall food line and the Pavilion food line open

11:00 AM Cake Walk Booth & Ring Toss, Country Store, Duck Pond, Face Painting,

Soda Water and Snow Cone Stand, Train Ride, and Nacho Booth open

11:00 AM All Booths open

11:30 AM Music in the Dance Pavilion

1:00 PM Corn Hole will start at 1 pm till ??

1:00 PM Auction begins in the New Pavilion

2:00 PM Bingo in the Air-Conditioned Parish Halls

1:00 PM Music in the Dance Pavilion

8:00 PM Sweepstakes Drawing – Gazebo area

10:00 PM Spectacular Fireworks Show

Additional food & drink items: Iced Tea, Lemonade, Nachos, Hamburger, High Hill Sausage, French Fries, and Onion Rings.

Music during the day by Texas Sound Czech and Mark Halata with Texavia

The dance at night is free and features TEXAS SUNDOWN

Come out, meet your friends, and enjoy the fun at the St. Mary Church Picnic!

Don’t forget … Monday, Sept. 2, (Labor Day) is clean-up day after the picnic.

If we all come out early Monday to help, this chore will be easy and we will all feel great for doing our share.
